items.title: Celtic join Euro mega rich in UEFA profit bonanza as club cash reserve sees records smashed in £47m boom

items.title: Celtic manager Martin O'Neill on VAR: 'We will not be needing a referee anymore'
items.description: Martin O'Neill is furious at the 'ridiculous' red card that will now see Auston Trusty miss three crucial games for Celtic, and has criticised the use of VAR in Scotland.

items.title: VAR 'debilitating' for referees - Celtic's O'Neill
items.description: Martin O'Neill is of the view VAR is "debilitating" for officials on the pitch as he brands the Scottish FA process for appealing against decisions "worthless".

items.title: Martin O’Neill obliterates Celtic decision and brands it 'ridiculous nonsense' as ballistic boss skewers SFA

items.title: Alternate Celtic XI that could be deployed vs Stuttgart as Old Firm factor sees eight changes and shock starts

items.mediaText: Martin O'Neill may be forced to play an alternative XI against Stuttgart to give his side the best chance in the Old Firm. -  (AFP via Getty Images)
